content: I find it hilarious that you seem to think Westbrook is a better shooter “it’s immediately clear he’s better”…? Considering he’s a career 43.4% shooter who gets to dunk compared to the big O and his 48.5%, I disagree. Let’s not forget Oscar also shot better from the line in his career(83.8–82.2) and did his Triple double season 5 years younger than Russ and shot .478 while doing it.
